tools.title: Modding Tools
tools.subtitle: Discover our tools to help you with your modding projects

nxChecker.title: Nintendo Switch Checker
nxChecker.description: Check your Nintendo Switch compatibility with modding.

nxDevice.title: Device ID Extractor
nxDevice.description: Extract your Device ID from your PRODINFO.bin file.

ps5.title: PS5 UART Checker
ps5.description: Analyze UART error codes from your PlayStation 5.

help.title: How to find your serial number?
help.description: The serial number is located under your Nintendo Switch. It's a series of characters starting with XAW, XAJ, XKJ, XKW or HAE.

results.title: Check Result
results.success:
Unpatched Switch
You can install the hack
results.warning:
Undetermined Switch
Reason: Serial number not recognized
results.oled:
Not compatible
Reason: OLED Mariko Console
results.lite:
Not compatible
Reason: Lite Mariko Console
results.hae: 2025 Switch 2 (HAE) model detected. This console is patched

importantInfo.title: Important Information
importantInfo.preJune2018: Nintendo Switch consoles released before June 2018 are potentially compatible with modding.
importantInfo.incompatibleModels: Mariko, OLED and Lite models as well as Switch 2 are not compatible with current modding methods.
importantInfo.disclaimer: This checker is provided for informational purposes only. If in doubt, please consult our Discord server for more information.

nxDevice.title: NX Device ID Checker
nxDevice.subtitle: Analyze your PRODINFO.bin file to get your Device ID

warning.local: Your PRODINFO.bin file is processed locally in your browser.
warning.noServer: No data is sent to a remote server.

upload.title: Drag and drop your PRODINFO.bin file here
upload.subtitle: or click to select a file

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.format: Make sure the file is in .bin format
instructions.warning: Never share your complete PRODINFO.bin file

ps5.title: PS5 UART Checker
ps5.subtitle: Analyze UART error codes from your PlayStation 5

importantInfo.title: Important Information
importantInfo.local: Error code analysis is performed locally
importantInfo.disclaimer: This tool is provided for informational purposes only

search.title: Error Code Search
search.description: Enter a UART error code to get detailed information about the issue.

hero.title: SigHya Discord Server
hero.subtitle: Join our passionate console modding community. Share, learn and evolve with us!

features.title: Why join us?
features.subtitle: An active community dedicated to console modding

community.title: Active Community
community.description: Join a dynamic community of modding enthusiasts, always ready to share and help. Benefit from constant support and enriching exchanges.

expertise.title: Technical Expertise
expertise.description: Benefit from expert advice and detailed guides for all levels. Access comprehensive and up-to-date technical resources.

projects.title: Community Projects
projects.description: Participate in innovative projects and contribute to the evolution of the modding scene. Develop your skills by collaborating on exciting projects.

events.title: Exclusive Events
events.description: Enjoy special events, contests and live sessions with the community. Take part in unique and enriching moments.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.subtitle: Legal information and terms of use

publisher.title: Website Publisher
publisher.description: SigHya is an open source entity dedicated to console modding.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We use Cloudflare services only for security and traffic statistics. No IP addresses are stored by SigHya.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: Only one cookie is kept to remember your display preferences (night mode).

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We are committed to protecting your personal data and respecting your privacy in accordance with GDPR.

provider.title: Provider
provider.description: Website hosting is provided by LWS, located in FRANCE.

license.title: License
license.description: All content present on the site excluding manga (texts, images, graphics, logo, icons, etc.) is under open source license, unless otherwise stated.

usage.title: Content Usage
usage.description: Any reproduction, distribution, modification, adaptation, retransmission or publication, even partial, of these different elements is authorized in compliance with the terms of the applicable open source license.

contact.questions: For any questions regarding this legal notice, please don't hesitate to contact us.

roadmap.title: Roadmap 2025
roadmap.description: SigHya is a non-profit project dedicated to computing, retro and modern gaming consoles, and modding. Discover our upcoming projects!

website.title: Website Redesign
website.description: A new, more modern and intuitive user experience to better serve our community.

infrastructure.title: Global Infrastructure Overhaul
infrastructure.description: Complete modernization of our infrastructure for better performance and security.

lanplay.title: Switch LAN Play Server
lanplay.description: Setting up a dedicated server for local network gaming on Nintendo Switch.

nxProjects.title: Nintendo Switch Projects
nxProjects.subtitle: Discover the latest versions of essential projects for modding your Nintendo Switch
nxProjects.warning: These projects are intended for educational and development purposes. Make sure to respect your console's terms of use.

about.title: About these projects
about.atmosphere: The most popular CFW (Custom Firmware) for Nintendo Switch, providing a solid foundation for homebrew and modifications.
about.hekate: Custom bootloader that allows you to boot different payloads and manage your Switch's partitions.
about.lockpick: Tool to extract encryption keys from your console, necessary for certain development tools.
about.tegraExplorer: File explorer for RCM, allowing you to navigate and modify your Switch's system files.

filters.noResults: No projects found matching your criteria
